greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = index where A088568 (or equally A294448) first reaches or exceeds n in magnitude.
comment: a(n) = smallest j such that |A088568(j)| >= n.
This is closely related to the function DELTA(n) studied by Brent (2016).
link: Richard P. Brent, Fast algorithms for the Kolakoski sequence, Slides from a talk, 2016.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 22 2017
